tool_description: Retrieve real-time screenshots with one request. Full API description at https://browshot.com/api/documentation
name: Website screenshots in real time
title: Website screenshots in real time

api_list.name: /account/info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://browshot.p.rapidapi.com/account/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "browshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /screenshot/delete
api_list.description: Delete details of your screenshots to remove any confidential information.

optional_parameters.name: data
optional_parameters.description: data to remove: image (default), url, metadata, all

api_list.name: /screenshot/create
api_list.description: Screenshots requests to private and shared instances require a positive balance.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL of the page to get a screenshot for

optional_parameters.name: instance_id
optional_parameters.description: instance ID to use (default: 12)

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: screenshot size: "screen" (default) or "page"

api_list.name: /instance/list
api_list.description: Get the list of instances available.
api_list.code:

url = "https://browshot.p.rapidapi.com/instance/list"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "browshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /browser/list
api_list.description: List of all predefined web browsers.

api_list.name: /browser/info
/screenshot/thumbnail
api_list.description: Sends back the thumbnail as a PNG file.

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Width of the thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: Height of the thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: scale
optional_parameters.description: Scale of the thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: zoom
optional_parameters.description: 1-100: zoom 1 to 100 percents

optional_parameters.name: ratio
optional_parameters.description: <fit|fill> (default: fit). Use fit to keep the original page ration, and fill to get a thumbnail for the exact width and height specified.

optional_parameters.name: left
optional_parameters.description: (default: 0) left edge of the area to be cropped

optional_parameters.name: right
optional_parameters.description: (default: 0) right edge of the area to be cropped

optional_parameters.name: top
optional_parameters.description: (default: 0) top edge of the area to be cropped

optional_parameters.name: bottom
optional_parameters.description: right edge of the area to be cropped

api_list.name: /screenshot/list
api_list.description: Get information about the last 100 screenshots requested.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of screenshots' information to return (maximum: 100)

api_list.name: /screenshot/share
api_list.description: Make your screenshots public, add notes, and share it with your friends and colleagues.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: Mote to add on the sharing page

api_list.name: /instance/info
api_list.description: Get details of a specific instance

api_list.name: simple
api_list.description: Get a screenshot or thumbnail in one request. make sure to follow all 302 redirections.

optional_parameters.name: instance_id
optional_parameters.description: Browser ID to use

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Width of the thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: Height of the thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Screenshot size: "screen" (default) or "page"

optional_parameters.name: cache
optional_parameters.description: Use a previous screenshot (same URL, same instance) if it was done within <cache> seconds. The default value is 24hours. Specify cache=0 if you want a new screenshot.

optional_parameters.name: referer
optional_parameters.description: Use a custom referrer

optional_parameters.name: post_data
optional_parameters.description: Send a POST requests with post_data, useful for filling out forms

optional_parameters.name: cookie
optional_parameters.description: Set a cookie for the URL requested

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: 0-10 (default: 5): number of seconds to wait after the page has loaded. This is used to let JavaScript run longer before taking the screenshot. Use delay=0 to take screenshots faster.

optional_parameters.name: flash_delay
optional_parameters.description: 0-10 (default: 10): number of seconds to wait after the page has loaded if Flash elements are present. Use flash_delay=0 to take screenshots faster.

optional_parameters.name: script
optional_parameters.description: URL of javascript file to execute after the page load event.

api_list.name: /screenshot/info
api_list.description: Once a screenshot has been requested, its status must be checked until it is either "error" or "finished".

optional_parameters.name: details
optional_parameters.description: 0-3 (default: 2): level of details about the screenshot and the page.
